name: @apcovernight/node-utils
description: Useful JS functionality used in multiple projects

scripts.coverage: nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | codeclimate-test-reporter
scripts.write-docs: jsdoc2md Parse/* > docs/Parse.md && jsdoc2md Format/* > docs/Format.md && jsdoc2md Utils/* > docs/Utils.md

author: Ian Egner <https://twitter.com/ianegner>
